HeroBanner.title: All Your Orders and Couriers Connected—Made Easy
HeroBanner.subtitle: Connect your online store or social media accounts, manage your orders seamlessly, and ship with confidence using 40+ trusted couriers worldwide.

HowItWorks.title: Made Simple in Just 3 Steps
HowItWorks.subtitle: Designed to be easy, so you can focus on what you do best—growing your business.

step1.title: Connect Your Store or Social Media
step1.description: Getting started is easy. Just sign up for free and link your online store, or generate a unique shipping link to share on social media. Orders will sync instantly to your dashboard.

step2.title: Review & Confirm Orders
step2.description: Review and confirm orders in a centralized dashboard. Select items ready to ship and manage everything in one place with ease.

step3.title: Ship with Your Preferred Couriers
step3.description: Pick from our discounted couriers or use your own courier accounts. Create shipments, print labels, and track deliveries—all with just a few clicks.

IntegrationsSection.title: Effortlessly Connect with All Your Sales Channels and Couriers
IntegrationsSection.description: No technical hassle—integrate your sales channels and couriers into one streamlined platform.

salesChannels.subtitle: channels
salesChannels.title: Sales Channels
salesChannels.description: Sync your store with Shpd and watch orders, shipments, and deliveries automatically update in one dashboard. A unified view for simpler, smoother management.

couriers.subtitle: couriers
couriers.title: Couriers
couriers.description: With integrations to over 40 couriers, Shpd ensures you have access to the best rates and reliable options for both local and international shipping. You're covered, no matter where you're sending.

advantages.title: You Need for Shipping, All in One Platform
advantages.subtitle: Shpd helps you streamline orders, shipments, and courier accounts from a single dashboard, so you can spend less time managing logistics and more time growing your business.

items.title: All Your Orders in One Place
items.description: Manage orders from online stores, social media, or manual entries—all in one easy-to-use interface. No more juggling multiple platforms. With Shpd, everything you need is just a click away.

items.title: One Control Center for All Your Couriers
items.description: Connect with over 40+ couriers, including DHL, FedEx, Aramex, J&T, and Bosta, instantly. Shpd brings all your courier accounts together, allowing you to compare rates, print labels, and track every shipment from one centralized hub.

items.title: Simple & Intuitive Order Management
items.description: Creating, updating, and fulfilling orders has never been easier. From new orders to returns, manage every step effortlessly in one dashboard—no technical know-how needed.

items.title: Flexible Shipping Options
items.description: Ship your way. Choose from Shpd's exclusive discounted courier rates or connect your own accounts for full control. Flexibility and choice at your fingertips.

items.title: Easy COD Monitoring
items.description: Stay on top of your Cash on Delivery (COD) payments with Shpd's comprehensive COD reports. Monitor payments and manage your finances with ease, so you're always in control.

items.title: Collaborate with Your Team
items.description: Add team members to your account for seamless teamwork on orders and shipments. With custom permissions, keep your workflow organized while maintaining control over sensitive data.

items.title: Real-Time Shipment Tracking
items.description: Monitor all your shipments in one place with real-time tracking updates. Automatically share shipment statuses with customers, keeping them informed and satisfied.

items.title: 24/7 Support When You Need It
items.description: Whether you need a quick answer or in-depth support, our team is here for you. Reach us via chat or email, and we'll help you keep your business running smoothly.

PricingSection.title: , Pay-As-You-Go Pricing
PricingSection.subtitle: No contracts, no hidden fees. Pay only when you ship.

MegaSignUpCta.title: Revolutionize Your Shipping Process with Shpd!
MegaSignUpCta.subtitle: Efficient, flexible, and designed to meet your business needs.

AboutUs.heroSubHeading: Royal Works, the proud owner of the "Shpd" brand, is a leading force in the logistics industry, providing innovative solutions tailored to meet the ever-changing needs of our clients. With registrations in both Egypt and France, we showcase our steadfast commitment to quality and reliability in every service we offer.
AboutUs.visionSubText: "Shpd" represents our vision of delivering comprehensive logistics services that cater to a wide array of markets. We are dedicated to maintaining transparency and efficiency in our operations, ensuring that our partners enjoy an exceptional experience.
AboutUs.commitmentsIntro: At Shpd, our customers come first. We are committed to delivering:
AboutUs.commitment1Text: We aim for excellence at every stage of the shipping process.
AboutUs.commitment2Text: From the moment of booking to the final delivery, our customers stay informed every step of the way.
AboutUs.commitment3Text: We actively welcome and address customer complaints and suggestions, fostering continuous improvement and growth.
AboutUs.commitment4Text: We maintain close relationships with our contracted shipping companies to ensure timely and accurate service.
AboutUs.commitment5Text: Our team is equipped to provide quick and effective answers to all customer inquiries.
AboutUs.futureVision: As we look ahead, we remain committed to expanding our services and delivering the best logistical solutions in the industry.

HowItWorks.heroHeading: Shipping Made Simple in Just 3 Steps
HowItWorks.heroSubHeading: Designed to be easy, so you can focus on what you do best—growing your business.
HowItWorks.step1HowItWorksText: Sign up free and integrate your favorite sales channels like Shopify, WooCommerce, or Salla for automatic order syncing.
HowItWorks.step1NoStoreText: Create a custom shipping link to share on social media or messaging apps like Instagram, Facebook, and WhatsApp. Customers can easily enter their details, which automatically appear in your dashboard.
HowItWorks.step1WhyThisHelpsText: With everything in one view, you’ll save time and avoid manual data entry errors.
HowItWorks.step2HowItWorksText: Review orders in your dashboard and confirm items that are ready to ship. Track orders through a simple pipeline—unfulfilled, confirmed, shipped, or canceled. Keep it organized and efficient as you process each order.
HowItWorks.step2WhyYoullLoveItText: Streamlined order management means fewer mistakes and happier customers. You’ll stay on top of every order, big or small.
HowItWorks.step3HowItWorksText: Select a courier based on your preferences. Use discounted shipping rates or connect your own accounts. Create shipments, print labels, and track packages from a single dashboard.
HowItWorks.step3WhyItMattersText: Optimize your shipping costs and speed by choosing the right courier for each order. Real-time tracking ensures you and your customers stay informed every step of the way.
HowItWorks.ctaHeading: Ready to Elevate Your Shipping Experience?
HowItWorks.ctaSubHeading: Join thousands of merchants using Shpd to simplify their shipping processes. It’s easy, efficient, and tailored to businesses like yours.

Advantages.heroHeading: Everything You Need for Shipping, All in One Platform
Advantages.heroSubHeading: Shpd helps you streamline orders, shipments, and courier accounts from a single dashboard, so you can spend less time managing logistics and more time growing your business.
Advantages.section1Text: No more switching between platforms! Shpd centralizes all your orders—from online stores, social media, and manual entries—into one view.
Advantages.section1Panel1Text: Orders from Shopify, WooCommerce, Salla, and more sync automatically to your dashboard.
Advantages.section1Panel2Text: Generate custom shipping links to capture orders from Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, WhatsApp, and keep them organized.
Advantages.section1Panel3Text: Easily add orders manually and integrate them smoothly into your workflow.
Advantages.section2Title: One Hub for All Your Couriers
Advantages.section2Text: Manage all your courier accounts in a single interface with Shpd.
Advantages.section2Panel1Text: Instantly connect with DHL, FedEx, Aramex, J&T, Bosta, and more.
Advantages.section2Panel2Text: Generate labels, track shipments, and manage couriers without leaving your dashboard.
Advantages.section2Panel3Text: Choose the best courier for each shipment by comparing rates and services.
Advantages.section3Text: Take control of your fulfillment process with Shpd’s easy-to-use order management.
Advantages.section3Panel1Text: Quickly review, confirm, and mark orders as ready to ship.
Advantages.section3Panel2Text: Handle returns just as smoothly as new orders from the same dashboard.
Advantages.section3Panel3Text: Simplify everything from order creation to fulfillment in one organized space.
Advantages.section4Text: Shpd provides the shipping flexibility your business needs.
Advantages.section4Panel1Text: Access exclusive rates with trusted courier partners.
Advantages.section4Panel2Text: Prefer to use your own couriers? Connect your accounts directly to Shpd.
Advantages.section4Panel3Text: Whether you’re shipping locally or internationally, choose what works best for you.
Advantages.section5Text: Stay updated on every shipment with real-time tracking.
Advantages.section5Panel1Text: See the status of every package, no matter the courier.
Advantages.section5Panel2Text: Keep customers informed with real-time tracking information sent directly to them.
Advantages.section6Text: Easily manage Cash on Delivery (COD) payments with Shpd’s comprehensive reporting tools.
Advantages.section6Panel1Text: View accurate reports on outstanding and completed payments.
Advantages.section6Panel2Text: Monitor COD across all couriers and shipments from one dashboard.
Advantages.section7Text: Work better together by adding team members to your Shpd account.
Advantages.section7Panel1Text: Invite your team to manage orders and shipments with you.
Advantages.section7Panel2Text: Control access to sensitive information and assign permissions.
Advantages.section7Panel3Text: Process orders quickly and efficiently as a team.
Advantages.section8Title: Reliable Customer Support, Always Here for You
Advantages.section8Text: Get help when you need it with Shpd’s dedicated support team.
Advantages.section8Panel1Text: Reach out to our team through chat for quick answers.
Advantages.section8Panel2Text: Send us an email for in-depth assistance.
Advantages.section8Panel3Text: We’re here to ensure you have everything you need to keep your shipping smooth.

Integrations.heroSubHeading: Easily connect to your favorite platforms and couriers, making order fulfillment and shipping a breeze.

salesChannel.description: Shpd integrates seamlessly with top sales platforms, so whether your customers shop online or through social media, all orders come straight to your dashboard for hassle-free processing. Create custom shipping links for social media orders and centralize everything under one roof.

courier.description: Gain full control over your shipping by connecting with 40+ couriers globally. Use Shpd’s discounted rates or link your own accounts to manage shipments efficiently. From label printing to rate comparison and tracking, every detail is at your fingertips in one user-friendly interface.

whyIntegrate.heading: One Platform, Endless Possibilities
whyIntegrate.description: With Shpd, integrating your sales channels and couriers is effortless, empowering you to automate the shipping process from beginning to end. Sync orders from multiple platforms, manage couriers in one place, and gain full visibility of your shipping flow—all while saving time and eliminating manual work. Experience the ease of centralized order and shipping management. Simplify your logistics with Shpd today.

Pricing.heroSubHeading: With Shpd, you're in control. Enjoy transparent, commitment-free pricing that scales with your business. Whether you’re sending a single package or thousands, you only pay for what you use, without any unexpected fees.
Pricing.title: Pay-As-You-Go Pricing
Pricing.subtitle: No contracts, no hidden fees. Pay only when you ship.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Shipping?
cta.subtitle: Sign up today and start managing your shipments with Shpd.

Insurance.heroSubHeading: At our company, we want to ensure that your shipping experience is as seamless and secure as possible. We offer shipment insurance for both documents and parcels, providing you with peace of mind as your items travel to their destination.
Insurance.documentOverviewText: When shipping documents, it’s crucial to follow our packaging guidelines to safeguard your important items and ensure a hassle-free delivery.
Insurance.documentPanel1Text: If your shipment is lost and uninsured, we will compensate you for the shipping fees only.
Insurance.documentPanel2Text: For insured shipments that go missing, you could receive up to $100 in compensation. The exact amount will be determined by our shipping team after you provide details about the lost documents and their contents.
Insurance.documentPanel3Text1: Whether insured or not, if your documents are damaged, you’ll need to initiate a claim. This process requires you to submit:
Insurance.documentPanel3ListItem1: A photo of the damaged documents
Insurance.documentPanel3ListItem2: An image of the packaging, including the envelope used for shipping
Insurance.parcelOverviewText1: To protect your parcels, we recommend adhering to our packaging instructions for safe shipping. When sending non-personal items, please include an invoice that states the item’s value, as this is necessary for customs clearance and determining insurance coverage.
Insurance.parcelOverviewText2: Keep in mind, the maximum insurance coverage is $10,000. If the declared value exceeds this limit, only $10,000 will be covered. Insurance applies only to lost items.
Insurance.claimsProcessSubtitle: If your parcel arrives damaged, here’s how to initiate a claim:
Insurance.claimsProofText: The recipient must sign for the delivery and file a complaint.
Insurance.claimsPackagingText: The sender should provide images of the internal and external packaging prior to shipping.
Insurance.claimsParcelPhotosText: Once received, the recipient should send photos of the parcel—both inside and out—along with clear images of any damaged items.
Insurance.claimsAssessmentText: After reviewing the submitted materials, we will assess whether the packaging was adequate. If it meets our standards, compensation will be based on the declared value of the contents. If the packaging is deemed insufficient, compensation may be denied or reduced at the discretion of our management team.
Insurance.importantNoteText1: Please note that our insurance does not cover fragile items or those prone to breaking.
Insurance.importantNoteText2: We’re here to help you navigate any challenges with your shipments, ensuring you feel confident and secure every step of the way!

tab1.title: 1. Security and Payment
tab1.contentP1: At Shpd, your security is our priority. All payment transactions are securely processed and encrypted through Stripe and Cowpay. Payments on our site are facilitated through Cowpay, utilizing systems developed by Fawry Pay and the National Bank of Egypt.

tab2.title: 2. Sender's Responsibility
tab2.contentP1: As the sender, you are fully responsible for the contents of your shipment. All items must comply with local and international laws. Shipping prohibited or unsafe items can result in the cancellation or return of your shipment, with a deduction of shipping label fees (30%, capped at 150 EGP), or destruction if deemed hazardous.
tab2.contentP2Text: For a list of prohibited items, please visit:

tab3.title: 3. Compensation for Shipments
tab3.contentP1: The shipping company will compensate customers for the declared value of the shipment as indicated on the invoice, up to a maximum of $1,200.
tab3.contentP2: Compensation for documents will be provided according to the terms of the insurance policy, provided the shipment is insured.
tab3.subheading3: Steps to File a Compensation Claim:
tab3.listItem1Text: Customers must take photos of the packages or documents both before and after packing to initiate the compensation process.
tab3.listItem2Text: If the shipment is damaged, the recipient must:
tab3.listItem2SubItem1: Provide photographic evidence of the damage upon receipt
tab3.listItem2SubItem2: File a complaint with the delivery representative.
tab3.listItem2SubItem3: Contact the shipping company in the destination country on the same day to establish their right to claim compensation.
tab3.listItem3Text: It is essential for customers to understand that providing evidence (such as photos) is a crucial requirement for a successful compensation claim.
tab3.listItem4Text: This policy is important for protecting customer rights and ensuring a smooth shipping process. Adhering to the specified procedures is vital for obtaining the compensation owed.
tab3.listItem5Text: The Customer must revise insurance policy, packing criteria, prohibited items and non compensated items before booking.

tab4.title: 4. Shipping Refunds
tab4.listItem1Text1: If the shipping company initiates a cancellation, customers are entitled to a full refund of
tab4.listItem2Text1: Should customers decide to cancel their shipment before it departs, they can receive a refund of

tab5.title: 5. Weight and Dimension Measurement Guidelines
tab5.contentP1Text1: Shipping costs are determined by the weight and dimensions provided by the sender. Please note that measurements may be re-evaluated during transit. If discrepancies are found, this could lead to additional charges or the return of the shipment, with a deduction of up to
tab5.contentP2: Once a shipment has left the sending country, any extra fees must be covered by the sender, as returns are not an option. Non-payment of these fees may unfortunately result in the destruction of the shipment.

tab6.title: 6. Packaging Guidelines
tab6.subheading1: The sender is responsible for proper packaging:
tab6.listItem1Text: Use an A4-sized envelope, as size can affect shipping costs.
tab6.listItem2Text: Use sturdy boxes (no substandard or gift boxes) to prevent the need for repackaging during transit, which could affect size and weight. Ensure contents are securely packed to avoid pressure on the box sides.

tab7.title: 7. Delivery Timeline
tab7.contentP1: Delivery timelines begin the day after the shipment is handed to the courier and are counted in business days. This excludes public holidays and customs clearance. Shpd does not guarantee delivery times; therefore, if your shipment does not arrive as expected, losses incurred will not be compensated.

tab8.title: 8. Undisclosed Items
tab8.contentP1: A fine of 10,000 EGP will be imposed for shipping any item without disclosure at booking. This fine also applies if necessary documentation and approvals for listed items are not provided.

tab9.title: 9. Customs Fees
tab9.contentP1: Customs duties or clearance fees may apply, determined by the local customs authority and the shipping company in the destination country. These fees are the recipient's responsibility, and delays in payment may lead to delivery delays.

tab10.title: 10. Customs Inquiries
tab10.contentP1: The customs authority may request additional information about the sender or recipient. It is the customer’s responsibility to communicate with customs, as Shpd cannot respond on your behalf.

tab11.title: 11. Pickup of Shipments
tab11.listItem1: A representative will be scheduled to pick up shipments the next business day after booking. While same-day bookings are possible, they are not guaranteed. If the representative does not arrive, please contact customer service for arrangements.
tab11.listItem2: Shipments from Egypt cannot be delivered to any branch of the shipping company. In such cases, the bill of lading will be void, and shipping fees will not be refunded, with potential penalties for branch delivery.
tab11.listItem3: For pickups in centers or villages, service may not be available daily. Typically, pickups occur within two to three business days and may only happen once a week.

tab12.title: 12. Delivery of Shipments
tab12.listItem1: For shipments arriving in Egypt, deliveries are made to the recipient's address, with the representative contacting them to arrange delivery.
tab12.listItem2: In rural areas, deliveries may not occur daily. Representatives usually arrive within two to three business days and may only service these areas once a week.
tab12.listItem3: Address or contact changes after issuing the shipping bill may incur penalties and additional fees.

tab13.title: 13. Customer Service
tab13.contentP1: We recommend contacting customer service in advance to confirm shipping options or required documentation in both sending and receiving countries to ensure a smooth delivery process.

tab14.title: 14. Policy Modifications
tab14.contentP1: Shpd, operated by Royal Works, reserves the right to modify these terms and policies at any time without prior notice.

tab15.title: 15. Acceptance of Terms
tab15.contentP1: By using Shpd’s services or making payments, you agree to these terms and conditions. The company reserves the right to change these terms as necessary.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.description: At Shpd, a proud subsidiary of Royal Works (Registration No. 130322), your privacy is our top priority. We are committed to protecting your personal information and ensuring its security. This privacy policy details how we collect, use, and share the information you provide while using our website or engaging with our customer service team. We encourage you to read it carefully, and please note that we may update this policy periodically. Any changes will be reflected here, so we recommend checking back regularly.
PrivacyPolicy.info1Description: You may share your information with us in several ways, including filling out forms on our website, reaching out via phone, email, or live chat. This includes creating an account, requesting price comparisons, contracting services, or participating in surveys and contests. The personal information we may collect includes your name, address, email, phone number, financial details, and recipient information if necessary.
PrivacyPolicy.info2Description: We utilize trusted payment gateways such as Cowpay and Stripe to process your payments. When you make a payment, you will need to provide financial information (like your bank account details) to authorize the transaction directly with these gateways. By sharing this information, you consent to the necessary data sharing with Shpd for payment processing. Please review the policies of these payment gateways on their official websites, as we will not share your financial information with third parties without your explicit consent.
PrivacyPolicy.info3Description: When you visit our website, we automatically gather information about your device, including your IP address, along with data about your visits and interactions with our services. This information may be combined with other data we collect to enhance your experience.
PrivacyPolicy.sharingSubtitle: We may share your personal information with third parties in the following situations:
PrivacyPolicy.serviceProvidersDesc: To enhance our services, we partner with third parties to perform specific functions and daily operations. This may involve sharing certain information with our partners within the Shpd network to enable them to provide services to you efficiently.
PrivacyPolicy.legalComplianceDesc: We may review customer data as needed to comply with applicable laws and regulations, assist law enforcement, or protect the rights, property, and safety of Shpd, its members, and others. Additionally, banks and payment processors like Stripe and Cowpay may disclose customer information in accordance with their own policies.
PrivacyPolicy.analyticsImprovementDesc: To improve our services, we may share information about customer visits with analytics and search engine providers. This sharing is done in a manner that ensures your anonymity is maintained.
PrivacyPolicy.businessTransactionsDesc: In the event of a sale or acquisition of any business or assets, we may disclose your personal information to potential buyers or sellers and their advisors. If Shpd or most of its assets are acquired, the personal information we hold about users will be treated as a transferable asset.
PrivacyPolicy.legalObligationsDesc: We may disclose personal information if required by law or in response to requests from law enforcement or regulatory bodies. This includes sharing information to safeguard the rights, property, and safety of Shpd and its users, as well as collaborating with other organizations for fraud prevention.
PrivacyPolicy.optOutDesc: You can opt out of having your personal information used for marketing purposes at any time. Just click the "Unsubscribe" link in any marketing email we send you.
PrivacyPolicy.accessControlDesc: Data protection laws grant you the right to access your personal information, object to its use for specific purposes, and request its deletion or restriction. You can also ask for a machine-readable copy of your data. If you have any requests regarding your personal data, please don't hesitate to contact us.
PrivacyPolicy.gdprTitle: Under the GDPR, customers have the following rights
PrivacyPolicy.accessRightDesc: Request access to your personal data.
PrivacyPolicy.rectificationRightDesc: Request correction of any inaccurate or incomplete data.
PrivacyPolicy.erasureRightDesc: Request deletion of your personal data, subject to certain exceptions.
PrivacyPolicy.restrictionRightDesc: Request restriction of processing your personal data.
PrivacyPolicy.portabilityRightDesc: Request your personal data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.
PrivacyPolicy.objectionRightDesc: Object to the processing of your personal data in specific circumstances.
PrivacyPolicy.changesDesc: We may periodically update this GDPR policy and will notify you of any significant changes. We encourage you to review this page regularly to stay informed about your rights and our practices.

illustrationSection.title: One Platform to Manage All Your Orders & Shipments

formSection.agreementText: By clicking "SIGN UP" I agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.

ProhibitedItems.title: Prohibited Items for International Shipping
ProhibitedItems.description: When it comes to international shipping, certain items are deemed prohibited due to legal restrictions in at least one of the countries involved. These items cannot be imported, exported, or otherwise transported. This includes not only items like alcohol and tobacco but also high-value goods that are irreplaceable. Additionally, the International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) specifies certain goods as prohibited.
items: Any items banned by law in the country of origin, transit, or destination, such as ivory.
Counterfeit goods infringing on intellectual property rights
Commemorative coins, medals, and high-value collectibles, including rare books, trading cards, and memorabilia.
Drugs and other illegal substances (including medicinal cannabis and mushrooms).
Engines, generators, and automotive parts containing fuel or oil
Firearms and their components, as well as military ammunition and replicas
Hazardous waste, including used syringes and medical waste
Flammable and hazardous materials (according to IATA guidelines)
Human organs, embryos, and remains, including ashes
Hunting trophies and animal parts, such as skin and bones
Items with pornographic or offensive content
Live animals, including mammals, reptiles, fish, birds, and insects
Magnets and items containing ferromagnetic materials
Money, including cash, banknotes, coins, and financial instruments
Prescription and non-prescription medications when shipped outside the EU
Tobacco and its products, including electronic cigarettes
Undeclared shipments or those requiring regulatory approval
Wet ice and any items that are damp, leaking, or emitting odors

Compliance.title: Compliance with Laws and Standards
Compliance.descriptionPart1: Shipping any item without the required documentation and approvals is strictly prohibited. It is also illegal to transmit data or upload materials that contain viruses or harmful software that could disrupt computer systems.
Compliance.descriptionPart2: All shipments must comply with applicable laws in both the country of origin and the destination. Furthermore, submissions must not include:

NonCompensation.title: Non-Compensation Items in International Shipping
NonCompensation.subtitle: Non-compensation items are goods that, while not outright prohibited, lack coverage:

cards.heading: Unpacked Luggage
cards.content: This includes suitcases, bags, and other luggage types without proper external packaging, such as plastic wrap or cardboard boxes.

cards.heading: Glass Items
cards.content: This category includes all objects made from glass, such as windows, aquariums, urns, mirrors, vases, and glass frames.

cards.heading: Inadequate Packaging
cards.content: Items that do not adhere to our specified packaging guidelines are considered inadequately packaged.

cards.heading: Returned Goods
cards.content: This encompasses damaged products and machinery that have been returned to the seller.

packagingStandards.heroSubtitle: At Shpd, we prioritize the safe and efficient handling of your shipments. As outlined in our usage policy, the responsibility for packaging rests entirely with you, our valued customer.

envelopes.title: Envelopes
envelopes.description: Please place all documents intended for shipping inside a white A4-sized envelope.
envelopes.note: Important Note : The envelope must be sealed in front of the courier to ensure the contents are verified before sealing.

plasticFolders.title: Plastic Folders
plasticFolders.description: Many customers opt for A4 plastic folders to protect documents from moisture. However, be aware that papers can easily fall out.

recommendation.title: Recommendation
recommendation.description: For added security, place the plastic folder inside an additional sealed A4 envelope, as shown in the attached images.

sizeConsiderations.title: Size Considerations
sizeConsiderations.description: For documents larger than A4, such as A3, please use appropriately sized envelopes. Keep in mind that package size affects shipping costs, as fees are based on volumetric weight, calculated with this formula:

lessThan1kg.title: Less than 1 kg
lessThan1kg.description: The envelopes depicted in the images are not recommended for shipments under 1 kg to avoid extra charges.

1to2kg.title: 1 to 2 kg
1to2kg.description: Envelopes are suitable for documents weighing between 1 kg and 2 kg.

moreThan2kg.title: More than 2 kg
moreThan2kg.description: For documents exceeding 2 kg, a sturdy box is required. Please provide the dimensions of the box (length, width, height), as size affects shipping costs.

packageShippingGuidelines.title: Package Shipping Guidelines
packageShippingGuidelines.subtitle: Follow these essential instructions when shipping packages to ensure your contents arrive safely and avoid any shipping issues.

giftBoxes.title: Gift Boxes
giftBoxes.description: The use of gift boxes is not permitted, as they are easy to open and can lose their contents. Wrapping gift boxes in materials like stretch film does not enhance security; packaging will be opened for inspection and not resealed.

compressedCardboard.title: Compressed Cardboard
compressedCardboard.description: Using compressed cardboard for packaging is not acceptable. Inspection processes may require opening the box, which can damage the contents or cause the box to explode due to pressure. Additionally, using an oversized box can lead to damage.

reconstructedBoxes.title: Reconstructed Boxes
reconstructedBoxes.description: Avoid attempting to reduce shipping costs by cutting or assembling pieces of cardboard to create smaller boxes. This practice increases the risk of tearing during transport, potentially leading to loss of contents.

note.title: Note:
note.description: Using improper packaging methods may result in additional protective packaging by our shipping team, which could affect box size and shipping costs. Volumetric weight is calculated as follows:

basicRequirementsRechargeable.title: Basic Requirements Rechargeable
basicRequirementsRechargeable.description: Ensure your package is in a box with four corners for easy opening and closing during inspections. The box should not be torn, compressed, or reconstructed.
basicRequirementsRechargeable.note: Note: If your box has any brand markings, please obscure them without damaging the box.

shippingFragileProducts.title: Shipping Fragile Products
shippingFragileProducts.description: When shipping fragile items, such as electronics, it's your responsibility to secure the contents using appropriate materials, such as: The level of padding should be tailored to the item’s fragility. If sending multiple items in one box, each should be securely packaged before combining them in a sturdy, uncompressed box. No external packaging, like straps or plastic bags, is allowed on the box.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: We recommend affixing a clear label indicating the package’s fragility. This label should be printed by you and placed on the corners to ensure safe transport.

measuringDimensionsAndWeight.title: Measuring Dimensions and Weight
measuringDimensionsAndWeight.subtitle: Round the dimensions and weight to the nearest whole number:

labelingCriteria.title: Labeling Criteria
labelingCriteria.description1: By following these guidelines, you ensure the safe and efficient shipping of your package.
labelingCriteria.description2: Make sure to print all shipping documents, including the bill of lading or invoice if necessary. Hand these documents directly to the courier outside the envelope—do not place any shipping-related papers inside the envelope or box. Remember to request a signed copy of the bill of lading from the courier for your records.

importantNote.title: Note:
importantNote.description: All images included are actual photos from our customers to illustrate the guidelines clearly.

ContactUs.heroSubHeading: Available Saturday to Thursday, from 10:00 AM to 06:00 PM (GMT+2)
ContactUs.formIntro: We’d love to hear from you! Please fill out the form below, and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Join over {count} people getting our emails
newsletter.info: We only send interesting and relevant emails.
